description.narrative: The creation of sector expertise working groups recognises the richness of the Caritas confederation and the importance of working together and drawing on the relative strengths of the member organisations to serve the people affected by disasters. To operate as a confederation, MOs should be aware of where expertise lies across member organisations worldwide, and should be able to draw on it and build expertise globally as a confederation. The members of the sectoral Working Groups will develop their skills and shared understanding of that sector and will be deployed to support Caritas MOs in their emergency programmes.
